data.lyric:
[ti:ghostin]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:thank u, next (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]ghostin - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)
[00:06.27]Lyrics by：Ariana Grande/Max Martin/Ilya Salmanzadeh/Savan Kotecha/Victoria Monet
[00:12.54]Composed by：Ariana Grande/Max Martin/Ilya Salmanzadeh/Savan Kotecha/Victoria Monet
[00:18.81]I know you hear me when I cry
[00:23.71]I try to hold it in at night
[00:27.42]While you're sleepin' next to me
[00:29.82]But it's your arms that I need this time this time
[00:37.45]Look at the cards that we've been dealt
[00:42.02]If you were anybody else
[00:45.84]Probably wouldn't last a day
[00:48.25]Every tear's a rain parade from hell from hell
[00:53.76]Baby you do it so well
[00:56.29]You been so understanding you been so good
[01:00.92]And I'm puttin' you through more than one ever should
[01:05.73]And I'm hating myself 'cause you don't want to
[01:10.32]Admit that it hurts you
[01:14.76]I know that it breaks your heart when I cry again
[01:20.81]Over him mmh
[01:23.97]I know that it breaks your heart when I cry again
[01:29.43]'Stead of ghostin' him
[01:31.85]We'll get through this we'll get past this I'm a girl with
[01:39.20]A whole lot of baggage
[01:41.18]But I love you we'll get past this I'm a girl with
[01:48.49]A whole lot of baggage oh yeah
[01:51.34]Though I wish he were here instead
[01:55.95]Don't want that living in your head
[01:59.65]He just comes to visit me
[02:01.96]When I'm dreaming every now and then and then
[02:09.75]And after all that we been through and after all that we been through
[02:14.78]There's so much to look forward to
[02:18.19]What was done and what was said
[02:20.48]Leave it all here in this bed with you with you
[02:25.93]Baby you do it so well
[02:28.70]You been so understanding you been so good
[02:32.93]And I'm puttin' you through more than one ever should
[02:38.09]And I'm hating myself 'cause you don't want to
[02:42.92]Admit that it hurts you baby
[02:46.93]I know that it breaks your heart when I cry again
[02:53.11]Over him mmh
[02:56.32]I know that it breaks your heart when I cry again
[03:01.71]'Stead of ghostin' him
[03:04.21]We'll get through this we'll get past this I'm a girl with
[03:11.65]A whole lot of baggage
[03:13.48]But I love you we'll get past this I'm a girl with
[03:21.00]A whole lot of baggage yeah
data.trans:
[ti:ghostin]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:thank u, next (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.27]//
[00:12.54]//
[00:18.81]我知道你听到我哭了
[00:23.71]夜晚时我努力抑制眼泪
[00:27.42]不想打扰熟睡在我身边的你
[00:29.82]但这次我需要你的怀抱
[00:37.45]看看我们经历了多少磨难
[00:42.02]如果不是你
[00:45.84]我可能一天也撑不下去
[00:48.25]每滴泪水犹如来自地狱的倾盆大雨
[00:53.76]宝贝 你真的太好了
[00:56.29]你多么善解人意 多么温柔善良
[01:00.92]我让你经历了太多痛苦
[01:05.73]我好恨我自己 因为你不愿
[01:10.32]承认自己很痛苦
[01:14.76]我知道 我一哭你就会心碎
[01:20.81]因为我是为别的男人而哭
[01:23.97]我知道 我一哭你就会心碎
[01:29.43]因为我无法忘记那个男人
[01:31.85]我们会熬过去的 我们会熬过去的 我这个女孩
[01:39.20]有很多放不下的东西
[01:41.18]但我爱你 我们会渡过难关的 我这个女孩
[01:48.49]有很多放不下的东西
[01:51.34]尽管我多希望是他在我身边
[01:55.95]我不想让你感到困扰
[01:59.65]但我忍不住想起他
[02:01.96]经常会梦见他
[02:09.75]我们携手经历了这么多
[02:14.78]未来还有那么多值得期待的东西
[02:18.19]过去做的事 过去说的话
[02:20.48]都让它们随风而去吧
[02:25.93]宝贝 你真的太好了
[02:28.70]你多么善解人意 多么温柔善良
[02:32.93]我让你经历了太多痛苦
[02:38.09]我好恨我自己 因为你不愿
[02:42.92]承认自己很痛苦 宝贝
[02:46.93]我知道 我一哭你就会心碎
[02:53.11]因为我是为别的男人而哭
[02:56.32]我知道 我一哭你就会心碎
[03:01.71]因为我无法忘记那个男人
[03:04.21]我们会熬过去的 我们会熬过去的 我这个女孩
[03:11.65]有很多放不下的东西
[03:13.48]但我爱你 我们会渡过难关的 我这个女孩
[03:21.00]有很多放不下的东西
